    net.threescale.api.v2
    This is the version2 API for the 3scale backend.

    • Uses of AuthorizeResponse in net.threescale.api.servlet.filter

      Methods in net.threescale.api.servlet.filter that return AuthorizeResponse 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      protected AuthorizeResponse AuthorizeServletFilter.authorizeForApp(String appId, String appKey, String referrer)
      Attempts an authorization of the given App Id, App Key and Referrer using the Server provided by the AuthorizeServletFilter.getServer() method.
      protected AuthorizeResponse AuthorizeServletFilter.authorizeForUser(String userKey, String referrer)
      Attempts an authorization of the given User Key and Referrer using the Server provided by the AuthorizeServletFilter.getServer() method.
